ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons
ygData.msgSnippet: Either Kobolds see invis by nature or they cast it as they spawn, I ve seen to recall a greater kobold begins to cast although it might have been a shaman
ygData.messageBody:
Either Kobolds see invis by nature or they cast it as they spawn, I've seen
to recall a "greater kobold begins to cast" although it might have been a
shaman class although I thought I noted it as strange at the time thinking
it wasn't one.

When I was in SolB the other night with my ranger character we had 2 of them
rot cause nobody needed/wanted them. I hadn't thought about it but maybe
I'll park my bard outside and switch off if we get another drop. Hmmm ...
hows the hunting in Lavastorm for a level 17 bard?

Reedwind - Bard
Underbrush - Ranger
Terris-Thule
----- Original Message -----
From: "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 2:42 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons


> reguarding invis in sol b, i know that the kobs and stuff see through the
> necro invis (gather shadows). most probably see through bard invis too
>
> -Minkin
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:emeeker@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 2:20 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons
>
>
>
> Has anyone tried to get these at a low level? Or does anyone know SolB
well
> enough to say whether a low level could make the dash to loot them (and
> survive waiting for them to drop)? Would I need inviso, or are there
things
> that see through it along the way (on, say a busy weekend night)?
>
> As a possibly inappropriate aside, should there just HAPPEN to be someone

> to contact me, Tszaaz/Tsengu would be happy to talk to you *smile*
>
> Tszaaz-Povar/Tsengu-Nameless
